ministry_name: Welfare and Relief for Fishermen During Lean Seasons and Natural Calamities Scheme, Puducherry
details: The scheme "Immediate Relief Assistance" is introduced to extend financial assistance to the fishermen's families to compensate for the loss due to the missing breadwinner and to support them financially.
eligibility: Families of missing fishermen in Puducherry.
exclusions: Not applicable for those receiving similar assistance from other schemes.
benefits: Financial compensation to families of missing fishermen.
post_application_process: Verification and direct transfer of funds.
documents_required: ID proof, proof of missing status, family details.
faqs: What is the amount provided? How can I apply?

scheme_name: AICTE SHORT TERM TRAINING PROGRAMME-SFURTI SCHEME
details: Short Term Training Programme-SFURTI Program aims to provide financial assistance from AICTE to the institutions for conducting faculty and student trainings to enable faculty members and students in the field of technical education.
benefits: Financial support for conducting technical training programs.
application_process: Institutes apply through the AICTE portal.
faqs: Who can apply? How much funding is available?

scheme_name: Burial and Ex-gratia Payment Scheme in Case of Death of Unregistered Laborer During Work at Construction Site
details: Launched in 2014, this scheme provides funeral assistance and ex-gratia payments in case of death or permanent disability of unregistered laborers at construction sites.
eligibility: Unregistered construction workers and their families in Madhya Pradesh.
exclusions: Registered laborers receiving benefits from other schemes.
benefits: Financial assistance for funeral and ex-gratia payments.
application_process: Application via local labor department offices.
faqs: What is the compensation amount? Who can apply?

ministry_name: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
details: NSIC adopts a consortia approach to form consortia of units manufacturing the same products, thereby easing out marketing problems of MSEs.
faqs: How can an enterprise join the consortia?

details: This scheme provides financial assistance for funeral expenses of a deceased Brahmin where the family has no other means.
eligibility: Brahmin families in Andhra Pradesh with no financial means.
application_process: Apply through the Andhra Pradesh welfare department.
faqs: What amount is provided for funeral expenses?

scheme_name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for Backward Class Students
details: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to backward class students studying at the pre-matriculation level in India. Monthly scholarships of varying amounts are provided to eligible students.
eligibility: Students belonging to the Backward Class category studying in recognized pre-matric schools.
exclusions: Students who are already receiving similar scholarships from other government schemes.
benefits: Monthly financial assistance to cover educational expenses.
application_process: Eligible students can apply through the Madhya Pradesh scholarship portal or their respective schools.
post_application_process: Selected students will receive financial aid directly in their bank accounts through DBT (Direct Benefit Transfer).
faqs: What is the last date for application?

scheme_name: Safai Karmakaar Ke Putr/Putri Hetu Vishesh Coaching Yojana
details: The scheme provides special coaching facilities for the children of unorganized sector workers in Chhattisgarh. Launched on 28 April 2012.
eligibility: Children of registered unorganized workers in Chhattisgarh.
exclusions: Students who are not registered under the unorganized sector workers’ database.
benefits: Free coaching facilities for higher education and competitive exams.
application_process: Applications can be submitted through the labor department’s portal or offline at designated centers.
post_application_process: Selected candidates will be allocated coaching centers based on their location and subject requirements.

scheme_name: The West Bengal Incentive Scheme: Additional Incentive for Adventure Tour Operators
ministry_name: Department of Tourism, Government of West Bengal
details: This scheme provides reimbursement incentives on SGST payments for purchasing adventure & sports equipment, tents, dinghies, and related accessories.
eligibility: Registered adventure tour operators in West Bengal.
exclusions: Businesses not registered under the tourism department.
application_process: Eligible businesses must submit applications through the Tourism Department’s portal.
post_application_process: Verification of documents and direct reimbursement upon approval.
faqs: What items are eligible for reimbursement?
How long does it take for reimbursement?

scheme_name: The West Bengal Incentive Scheme: Additional Incentive on Generation of Employment
ministry_name: Department of Tourism, Government of West Bengal
details: This scheme provides reimbursement for expenditure incurred for paying contributions towards ESI and EPF.
eligibility: Tourism businesses in West Bengal that generate employment.
exclusions: Businesses not registered under the tourism department.
benefits: Reimbursement of ESI and EPF contributions.
application_process: Eligible businesses must submit applications through the Tourism Department’s portal.
post_application_process: Verification of employee records and reimbursement processing.
faqs: What is the timeline for processing?

scheme_name: The West Bengal Incentive Scheme: Interest Subsidy on Term Loan
ministry_name: Department of Tourism, Government of West Bengal
details: This scheme provides interest subsidy on the annual interest liability of term loans borrowed for eligible tourism projects.
eligibility: Tourism businesses with approved projects in West Bengal.
exclusions: Businesses not registered under the tourism department.
benefits: Interest subsidy on term loan interest payments.
application_process: Applicants must apply through the Tourism Department’s portal with loan details.
post_application_process: Verification of loan documents and subsidy disbursement.

scheme_name: The West Bengal Incentive Scheme: Reimbursement of Stamp Duty and Registration Fee
ministry_name: Department of Tourism, Government of West Bengal
details: The scheme provides reimbursement of stamp duty and registration fees paid by eligible tourism units.
eligibility: Registered tourism businesses in West Bengal.
exclusions: Businesses that have already availed other stamp duty reimbursements.
benefits: Full or partial reimbursement of stamp duty and registration fees.
application_process: Applications can be submitted through the Tourism Department’s portal.
post_application_process: Verification of registration documents and reimbursement processing.

scheme_name: The West Bengal Incentive Scheme: State Capital Investment Subsidy
ministry_name: Department of Tourism, Government of West Bengal
details: The scheme provides capital investment subsidies for eligible tourism projects.
eligibility: MSMEs and large tourism businesses investing in West Bengal.
application_process: Applications must be submitted with investment details.
post_application_process: Verification of investment details and subsidy processing.

scheme_name: West Bengal Textile Incentive Scheme: Power Subsidy
ministry_name: Dept. of MSME&T, Government of West Bengal
details: Provides power subsidy on electricity consumption for 5 years from the date of commencement of production.
eligibility: Textile businesses approved under the scheme.
exclusions: Non-eligible industries outside the textile sector.
benefits: Reduction in power costs through government subsidy.
application_process: Apply through the MSME&T department’s official portal.
post_application_process: Review and approval process by the concerned authority.
faqs: What is the subsidy duration? 5 years.

scheme_name: West Bengal Textile Incentive Scheme: State Capital Investment Subsidy
ministry_name: Dept. of MSME&T, Government of West Bengal
details: Provides State Capital Investment Subsidy for fixed capital investment.
application_process: Submit an application via the state MSME&T portal.
post_application_process: Verification and subsidy disbursal after approval.
faqs: How much subsidy is provided? Varies by investment size.

scheme_name: West Bengal Textile Incentive Scheme: Subsidy for Water Conservation/Environment Compliance
ministry_name: Dept. of MSME&T, Government of West Bengal
details: Offers reimbursement for Effluent Water Treatment Plant costs.
eligibility: Textile businesses implementing water conservation measures.
exclusions: Industries not part of the textile sector.
application_process: Apply online with environmental compliance documents.
faqs: Who can apply? Registered textile industries.

scheme_name: Workers In Case of Partial Permanent Disablement - JKBOCWWB
details: Provides financial assistance to registered BOC workers suffering partial permanent disablement.
eligibility: Registered BOC workers with valid certification.
application_process: Submit an application through the JKBOCWWB portal.
post_application_process: Review and disbursement of financial assistance.
faqs: How much assistance is provided? Depends on the severity of disability.

scheme_name: Advance / High Skill Training - Development of Industries Scheme
details: Aims to enhance skills of individuals who have completed basic training.
benefits: Skill enhancement and stipend during training.
application_process: Apply through the Puducherry government portal.
post_application_process: Screening and allocation to training programs.
faqs: Is there a stipend? Yes, for eligible candidates.
